text: Now that we're in the middle of spring and patiently waiting for summer... it's the perfect time to upload a fall theme. The Harvest Moon series has that relaxing energy that makes games like these (or Animal Crossing) so pleasant and addicting. I love this particular theme with its synth bass and rhodes.
author: SupraDarky

text: Unfortunately, that static you're hearing made its way into the game itself. It sounds like they failed the sound compression and no official soundtrack was ever released.

text: I loved Harvest Moon for years. I remember spending an absurd amount of time failing at the original, or trying to romance all the bachelorettes in Friends of Mineral Town. Lately I have grown cold to the franchise and I would like to go through Stardew Valley instead, but what I never get tired of is the soundtracks.
author: Hefaestos

text: As much as I like this, friends of mineral town will always be my all time favorite harvest moon game until I die.  To me, it was just absolutely perfect and is one I can go back to no matter what
author: Xenoriddley

text: It says a lot that some of my favorite parts of Stardew Valley borrowed off Magical Melody's mechanics.  Good pick.
